nodes.bodyText: I think a test for this is missing?
I think we should rename this to prepareDataStreamCreateIndexRequest, since the hidden setting is applied, making this method data stream specific.
I wonder if for data streams we should disallow applying aliases, mappings and settings to the new index? It feels odd that you cannot specify them on create data stream but can on rollover?
I think we need to also rename this method?

The TransportRolloverAction#checkBlock() method should be changed.
The following
IndicesOptions indicesOptions = IndicesOptions.fromOptions(true, true,
            request.indicesOptions().expandWildcardsOpen(), request.indicesOptions().expandWildcardsClosed());

should be changed into:
IndicesOptions indicesOptions = IndicesOptions.fromOptions(true, true,
            request.indicesOptions().expandWildcardsOpen(), request.indicesOptions().expandWildcardsClosed(), 
            request.indicesOptions().expandWildcardsHidden(), request.indicesOptions().allowAliasesToMultipleIndices(), 
            request.indicesOptions().forbidClosedIndices(), request.indicesOptions().ignoreAliases(), 
            request.indicesOptions().ignoreThrottled(), request.indicesOptions().includeDataStreams());

This why the modified test in DataStreamIT failed.
